meta_data.description: 1730 Sq. Ft. - Rent 3 BHK Apartment / Flat in Paramount Golfforeste, Sector ZETA Greater Noida * 9 Property & locality photos * Semifurnished * - 2nd floor (out of 16). View contact number for free. Click for complete details on 99acres.com

structured_data.description: Paramount golfforeste is one of greater noida's most sought after destination for residential flats and this 3 bhk flat for rent in sector zeta greater noida, is your opportunity to be a part of this community. Additionally, this property is in vicinity to important points of interest and is close to metro station, close to school, close to hospital and close to railway station. This flat consists of 3 bathrooms & 3 balconies in 1220 sq.Ft. Carpet area. This flat is constructed on 1742 sq.Ft. Area. Parking available: 1 covered parking & 1 open parking. This flat lies on the 2nd floor of a 16 storey building. Well maintained 1-5 years property. Furnished flat with 7 light, 4 fan, 4 bed, 3 wardrobe, 1 sofa, 1 fridge, 1 water purifier, 1 modular kitchen, 1 chimney, 1 dining table, 1 curtains and 1 exhaust fan. Property will be leased for 6 months from mon, 29 sep 2025 to families, single men and single women only with a notice of 1 month for a duration of 6 months. The expected rent is 27,000 monthly. Electricity & water charges are excluded. Built in features are reserved parking, piped-Gas, power back-Up, water purifier, natural light, airy rooms and spacious interiors etc. You will get access to swimming pool, fitness centre / gym, club house / community center, park, shopping centre, cctv surveillance, lift(s), security personnel, maintenance staff and water softening plant etc. In this society. Additional features with this property include rain water harvesting, waste disposal, no open drainage around, low density society, corner property, pet friendly and in a gated society. Power backup: Full. The flat has a north-West orientation. The flat's flooring is marble.
